MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the L9 postcode area of Liverpool, affecting properties in Gladstone Road and surrounding areas.  We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 9:28pm.  In order to complete repairs, engineers on site will need to isolate the power to other properties and we expect the power to be restored by 4am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:37pm on 6th April 2021
